SEARCH
Package org.opencastproject.userdirectory.ldap

Class LdapUserProviderInstance

java.lang.Object
org.opencastproject.userdirectory.ldap.LdapUserProviderInstance
All Implemented Interfaces:
CachingUserProviderMXBean, UserProvider
public class LdapUserProviderInstance extends Object implements UserProvider, CachingUserProviderMXBean
A UserProvider that reads user roles from LDAP entries.

      public String getOrganization()
      Returns the identifier for the organization that is associated with this user provider. If equal to UserProvider.ALL_ORGANIZATIONS, this provider will always be consulted, regardless of the organization.
